12 Boiler::Boiler(const double deaeratorPressure, const double combustionEfficiency, const double blowdownRate,
13  const double steamPressure, const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity quantityType,
14  const double quantityValue, const double steamMassFlow)
15  : deaeratorPressure(deaeratorPressure), combustionEfficiency(combustionEfficiency),
16  blowdownRate(blowdownRate), steamPressure(steamPressure), quantityType(quantityType),
17  quantityValue(quantityValue), steamMassFlow(steamMassFlow)
18 {
19  calculateProperties();
20 }
21 
22 void Boiler::calculateProperties() {
23  auto sp = SteamProperties(steamPressure, quantityType, quantityValue).calculate();
24  steamProperties = {steamMassFlow, sp.specificEnthalpy * steamMassFlow, sp};
25  steamProperties.quality = 1; // TODO question tell UI guys that there needs to be a warning
26 
27  sp = SteamProperties(deaeratorPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::QUALITY, 0).calculate();
28  feedwaterProperties = {steamMassFlow / (1 - blowdownRate / 100),
29  sp.specificEnthalpy * (steamMassFlow / (1 - blowdownRate / 100)), sp};
30 
31  sp = SteamProperties(steamPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::QUALITY, 0).calculate();
32  double const blowdownMassFlow = feedwaterProperties.massFlow * (blowdownRate / 100);
33  blowdownProperties = {blowdownMassFlow, sp.specificEnthalpy * blowdownMassFlow, sp};
34 
35  boilerEnergy = steamProperties.energyFlow + blowdownProperties.energyFlow - feedwaterProperties.energyFlow;
36  fuelEnergy = boilerEnergy / (combustionEfficiency / 100);
37 }
38

44 double Boiler::getSteamMassFlow() const { return steamMassFlow; }
